donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
outputs.output_descr: The National Department comes as a follow on the resolution of the displacement problem in Timor-Leste. The project will support the development of sustainable capacity for peace building and social cohesion both at the national and community level through (1) Institutionalising peace-building and social cohesion mechanisms and procedures in the national government; (2) strengthening conflict resolution capacity and mechanisms; (3) enhancing women's participation and role in peace-building and social cohesion, and (4) promoting conflict sensitive development.

The project will support the implementation of the National Recovery Strategy by 1) strengthening the Ministry of Social Solidarity's dialogue teams both in the capital and the Districts affected by displacement; 2) developing dialogue processes and mechanisms suited to specific local contexts and 3) promoting reconciliation in communities through dialogue  and mediation, developing the capacity of community leader in conflict management, and implementing community stabilization activities.

project_descr: Strengthening Institusional Structure and Mechanism for Dialogue
